### Rust Monster

_A mud-brown insect as big as a wolf with two feathery antennae. Consumes metal._

**LV** 4, **AL** N
**AC** 13, **HP** 19, **MV** near (climb)
**ATK** 2 claw +3 (1d6)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| +2 | +3 | +1 | -3 | +1 | -3 |

**Corrosive:** Metal that touches the rust monster is destroyed on a d6 roll of 1-3.
